description:
This market asks whether two or more United States Supreme Court Justices will be nominated by the President of the United States between January 1, 2022 and December 31, 2022.

If two or more United States Supreme Court Justices are nominated by the President of the United States between January 1, 2022 and December 31, 2022, 11:59:59 PM ET, this market will resolve to "Yes". Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Note: if a new justice is nominated before the resolution date, but the date of their confirmation hearing occurs after the resolution date of this market, this market will resolve to “Yes”.

The primary resolution source for this market will be official information from the US government (https://www.senate.gov/legislative/nominations/SupremeCourtNominations1789present.htm), however other credible media may be used.

markets.question: Will two or more U.S. Supreme Court Justices be nominated in 2022?

title: Will two or more U.S. Supreme Court Justices be nominated in 2022?
